channel.title: Events on CASTogether
channel.description: Recent content in Events on CASTogether

item.title: CAST #1: Busyness
item.description: How does busyness hinder relationships? Who does being busy well? Why is it so pervasive? What can be done to leverage it for God’s purposes? When must we go against culture and label it an idol? These are some of the conversations and concepts we explored together at this two-hour event for women who want to come alive in Christ.

item.title: CAST #2: Restoration
item.description: Where are we as people, communities, the Church, and creation broken? What is keeping us from restoration? How can we transcend these obstacles to embrace and advocate wholeness through our Savior?

item.title: CAST #3: Waiting
item.description: On Good Friday, Jesus died. On Easter Sunday, Jesus rose again. But on Saturday, we waited. Creation waited. Our God waited. Hope seemed dead, darkness the assassin. Call it a cave, call it the dark night of the soul – whatever label you give it, it is a painful time: waiting, hoping, and clinging with nothing but faith that the Light will shine again, that He will redeem our “Saturday”.

item.title: CAST #4: Women
item.description: The theme of CAST #4 was Women. We examined it from the personal level of women’s identities, the community level of women in society, and the Church level of women in ministry. A portion of ticket proceeds was donated to Changing Lives Center.

item.title: CAST #5: Breaking
item.description: Breaking: deconstruction of faith. Brokenness: examining our criminal justice system. Breaking through: redemption and transformation.

item.title: CAST #6: Upheaval
item.description:
Upheaval in our lives.
Upheaval in society.
Upheaval in institutions - including the Church.
Join us for CAST #6: Upheaval on Saturday, 9.15.18.
